data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of South Caicos and East Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of South Caicos and East Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in South Caicos and East Caicos to agree with you and with one another.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in South Caicos and East Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, help 2 new simple churches start among the 1,200 people in the state of South Caicos and East Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Cockburn Harbour
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Cockburn Harbour, South Caicos and East Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands.
Father, help the stressed and anxious in South Caicos and East Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 384 believers in the state of South Caicos and East Caicos to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.focus_label: South Caicos and East Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands

data.prayer: Father, help the 384 believers in South Caicos and East Caicos to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 817 lost friends and neighbors.

location.name: South Caicos and East Caicos
location.full_name: South Caicos and East Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands
